meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ken Dasher Toby Crew Mark Japinga Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6650.

td.p: Ken Dasher, an archivist from Raleigh, North Carolina
Toby Crew, a commercial pilot from Natick, Massachusetts
Mark Japinga, a legislative researcher from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,199)

tr.td: WHAT AN ICE PARTY
TIME'S 50 WORST CARS OF ALL TIME
COUNTRIES' LOWEST POINTS
COMPOUND WORDS
ANIMAL CARE
HERE'S JOHNNY!
